mapper.select: SELECT u1.user_id AS user_id, u2.user_id AS friend_id, m.message_id, m.sender_name, m.receiver_name, m.message, m.send_time FROM friendlist f JOIN USER u1 ON f.user_id = u1.user_id JOIN USER u2 ON f.friend_id = u2.user_id JOIN ( SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, message_id, message, send_time FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY sender_name, receiver_name ORDER BY send_time DESC) AS rn FROM message ) t WHERE rn < 10 ) m ON (m.sender_name = u1.username AND m.receiver_name = u2.username) ORDER BY user_id, friend_id, send_time DESC;
